====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[carry]]; to [[lift]]
#: {{zh-x|提 得{de} 動|to be able to '''carry'''}}
#: {{zh-x|提 不 動|to be unable to '''carry'''}}
#* {{zh-x|這 瓶 酒 我 提 不 起來。|I can't '''lift''' this bottle of wine.}}
#* {{zh-x|把 箱子 提 到 那邊|to '''carry''' the box over there}}
#* {{zh-x|肩 上 提 着 一個 籃子|to '''carry''' a basket on the shoulder}}
# to [[raise]]; to [[increase]]
#: {{zh-x|提價|to increase price}}
# to [[mention]]; to [[nominate]]
# to [[point out]]; to [[put forward]]
#: {{zh-x|提出|to point out}}
# {{lb|zh|Chinese calligraphy}} a rising stroke ({{m|mul|㇀}})
